Argument.title: argument
Argument.description: Hash defining a single measure input

name.description: Machine readable argument name as defined in the measure.xml

value.description: Value that the argument is to be set to

Workflow Step Result.description: Result is populated when the workflow step is run.

value.description: Overall result value of the measure.

initial_condition.description: Condition of the model before the workflow step

final_condition.description: Condition of the model after the workflow step

errors.description: Any errors that ocurred during the workflow step.  Simulation workflow will halt if any errors are present.

warnings.description: Any warnings that occurred during the workflow step.  Simulation workflow will not halt due to precense of warnings.

info.description: Any info messages that occur during the workflow step.

attributes.description: Named output attributes that are added using runner.registerValue

files.description: New files that are generated during the worfklow step

stdout.description: Output written to standard out during workflow step.

stderr.description: Output written to standard error during workflow step.

Measure Step.description: This step runs a measure with given arguments.  The measure can either be a Model, EnergyPlus, or Reporting Model.

measure_dir_name.description: Measure directory name containing the measure.rb file

ModelToIdf Step.description: This step converts the Model to EnergyPlus IDF

EnergyPlus Step.description: This step runs EnergyPlus as well as ExpandObjects and preprocessing the IDF.

Post Process Step.description: This step deletes temporary files and copies results to a known location.  Omitting this step is equivalent to setting post_process equal to none.

Workflow Steps.description: Array of measures to be executed in the simulation process

Seed Definition.title: seed_file
Seed Definition.description: String defining the filename for the seed model in the file_paths

Weather Definition.title: weather_file
Weather Definition.description: String defining the filename for the weather file in the file_paths

OpenStudioWorkflow Schema.description: JSON Schema for the OpenStudioWorkflow (OSW) file format

file_format_version.description: Currently 0.1, however will infered to be the default of the software package unless otherwise specified

root.description: Path to the root directory against which relative paths are evaluated.  If root is empty, the directory containing the osw is used.

run_directory.description: Path to the run directory relative to root directory: note that a run folder will be created in the target location

file_paths.description: A set of ordered directories relative to root_directory to search for required files and libraries

items.description: A path relative to the root_dir which should be searched for support files and folders

measure_paths.description: A set of ordered directories relative to root_directory to search for required measures

items.description: A path relative to the root_directory which should be searched for support files and folders

osa_id.description: UUID of the .osa file fron which this file was generated, or null if not generated from a .osa file

osa_checksum.description: Checksum of the .osa file from which this file was generated, or null if not generated from a .osa file

osd_id.description: UUID of the .osd file from which this file was generated, or null if not generated from a .osd file

osd_checksum.description: Checksum of the .osd file from which this file was generated, or null if not generated from a .osd file

current_step.description: Index of current workflow step, first step is index 0. Index remains at the last running step if error occurs.

completed_status.description: If the workflow is complete records if it failed or succeeded.

Argument Array.description: Array defining inputs to the measure

Timestamp.description: ISO8601 string defining a fully qualified date time
